name: About Me
body:
### Who am I
I an ICT Undergraduate from University of Rajarata. Also I give my contribution to FOSS related works in Sri Lanka and Internationally. I'm very much interested Python,Ruby on Rail and Linux Device Driver development. Use Qt and GTK+ development toolkits for C++ development. Loves to collect information & pictures related to diesel locomotives as a hobby.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
